title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 47.3 - Placement
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 47.3 - Placement

State Regulations

Splash guards required by subdivision 25 of section
375
of
the Vehicle and Traffic Law and these regulations, shall be affixed to the
vehicle in such a way that the distance from the lower end of the splash guard
to the ground shall not exceed one third of the distance, measured along the
ground from the bottom of the splash guard to the point of contact of the rear
wheel. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
47.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
